name: Legends of Loot
description:
ARE YOU READY TO BECOME A LEGEND? PLAY FOR FREE!

FORTUNE and GLORY await you in Majesco’s newest mobile game, LEGENDS of LOOT.

Don’t let the DARK TUNNELS, BUZZING SAWS and MONSTERS frighten you. This not-so-typical ADVENTURE is yours for the taking.

Features include:

• Twisting Mazes, Mind-Bending Puzzles and Treacherous Traps – You must use your wits to solve puzzles and ensnare enemies while exploring and plundering nearly 100 mazes spread across iconic Egyptian, Medieval, Mayan and Asian regions.

• Be the Hero, Vanquish Enemies, Save the Day – Using a variety of touch-screen gestures and the accelerometer to attack, parry, shield or dodge, your skills will be tested as you try to master the challenging first-person combat mechanic.

• Stand Out From the Crowd – Outfit your hero with the latest fashions made up of unique and quirky weapons, armor and magical items.

• Bet Big, Win Bigger – Wager in-game gold on skill-based level challenges. A wealth of treasure is up for grabs if you can beat the odds.

• Keep in Touch – Connect with your friends by using the in-game calendar to keep track of their progress and get notifications on special events.
